description: Get clarity on setup, features, security, and more to help you make the most of your Klat-32 Personal Account.

items.question: What is a Klat-32 Personal Account?
items.answer: A Personal Account on Klat-32 is designed for individuals to send and receive money, chat with other users, make payments, and manage personal transactions securely.

items.question: How do I create a Personal Account?
items.answer: Simply sign up on the platform using your phone number or email, then follow the guided steps.

items.question: What can I do with my Personal Account?
items.answer: You can send/receive money, make payments, and link your bank accounts for seamless transfers.

description: Explore answers to help you grow and manage your business effectively on the Klat-32 platform.

items.question: What is a Klat-32 Business Account?
items.answer: A Business Account supports merchants and service providers to list products/services, accept payments, and interact with customers via chat or call.

items.question: How do I register for a Business Account?
items.answer: You can apply through the app or web portal by submitting your business details and documents.

items.question: What features are available to business users?
items.answer: You can manage multiple products, track orders, accept payments, and add team members to your account.
